creator: k4stephens@gmail.com
text:
Created attachment 31201
Picture of JMS-point to point, where content exceeds display but cannot scroll to it...

The scrollbar for the content form field on the JMS point-to-point sampler does not work when content exceeds the length of the display.  Problem exists across the different look and feel options.  Do not have a problem with the scroll bar on the View Results Tree, do not see other samplers having this problem - seems it is just this sampler...  Exists in both JMeter 2.10 & 2.11

JDK => Oracle 1.7.0_21

creator: milamber@apache.org
text:
Good catch!

Fixed.

URL: http://svn.apache.org/r1557810
Log:
Scroll bar on jms point-to-point sampler does not work when content exceeds display
Remove dimension of panel
Bugzilla Id: 55999
